Rotation.RotationList: [Misc] Initialization|[Misc] MSV Events|[Misc] Pause Rotation|[Misc] Automatic Buffing|[Misc] Instanced Combat Detection|[Support] Dispersion|[Support] Healthstone|[Support] Mass Dispel|[Support] Desperate Prayer|[Support] Auto Potion (Heroism)|[Support] Shadowfiend|[Support] Power Infusion|[Support] Racials|[Support] Herbalism: Lifeblood|Mind Sear|Devouring Plague (High)|Mind Blast|Shadow Word: Death|Shadow Word: Death (Mouseover)|Mind Flay (Insanity) (NoCancel)|Mind Flay (Insanity)|Shadow Word: Pain (Boss)|Shadow Word: Pain (Mouseover)|Shadow Word: Pain|Vampiric Touch (Boss)|Vampiric Touch (Mouseover)|Vampiric Touch|Mind Spike (High)|Devouring Plague|Level 90 Talent|Mind Spike|Mind Flay (NoCancel)|Mind Flay
Rotation.RotationNotes:
Automatic Shadow Priest rotation based upon personal experience and SimulationCraft. 5.2 Ready!
Support: - Mouseover dotting of Vampiric Embrace + Shadow Word: Pain - Racial abilities - Automatic Boss dotting - Automatic healthstone usage - And much more, fully customizable in-game through PQInterface 2!
Keybindings are now fully configurable in-game!
- Left Shift: Mind Sear - Left Alt: Mass Dispel @ Mouseover location - Right Alt: Dispersion - Right Control: Pause Rotation - Right Shift: Toggle cooldown mode
With optional Vampiric Touch, Void Shift on mouseover and Level 15 talent keybindings all ready!
